welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Burlington, Canada! Known for its picturesque waterfront, charming downtown, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

restaurants.name: Coconut Kenny's Pizza
restaurants.description: Coconut Kenny's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Burlington.

restaurants.name: Asian 1
restaurants.description: Asian 1 is a asian restaurant located in Burlington.

restaurants.description: Johnny Carino's is a italian restaurant located in Burlington.

restaurants.name: MOD Pizza
restaurants.description: MOD Pizza is a pizzeria located in Burlington.

restaurants.name: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen
restaurants.description: Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a fried chicken joint located in Burlington.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal serving mostly international flights, with a few domestic flights as well.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toronto City Centre Airport, offering domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kitchener-Waterloo Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kitchener-Waterloo Regional Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
